Text: Angelo Francesco Lavagnino:  He is best known for scoring many films, including "Legend of the Lost", "Conspiracy of Hearts", "Gorgo", "The Legion's Last Patrol", "Daisy Miller", and two directed by Orson Welles, "Othello" and "Chimes at Midnight".
